items.title: The first post to my new blog
items.summary: This is the first post to my new blog (and it's about time)! I'm hosting my blog on GitHub Pages. It's dead-simple and free. I started an old blog a few years ago using Jekyll, but I grew tired of wondering whether Jekyll would be…
items.content_html:
This is the first post to my new blog (and it's about time)!

I'm hosting my blog on GitHub Pages. It's dead-simple and free.

I started an old blog a few years ago using Jekyll, but I grew tired of wondering whether Jekyll would be maintained very far into the future. I finally switched to Publii instead; it's also a static site generator.
